description:
Belldandy learns about Valentine`s day in Japan. Sayoko tries to set Belldandy up with the campus playboy Toshiyuki Aoshima. This could be trouble!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Paikka jossa voit näyttää tunteesi.
Ah ! Un lieu plein de romantisme
Ah! Where to Confess One`s Love?
ああっ想い伝える場所っ
